00071 /* Session data (mode-specific) */
00072 
00073 typedef struct SculptSession {
00074     /* Mesh data (not copied) can come either directly from a Mesh, or from a MultiresDM */
00075     struct MultiresModifierData *multires; /* Special handling for multires meshes */
00076     struct MVert *mvert;
00077     struct MPoly *mpoly;
00078     struct MLoop *mloop;
00079     int totvert, totpoly;
00080     float *face_normals;
00081     struct KeyBlock *kb;
00082     
00083     /* Mesh connectivity */
00084     const struct MeshElemMap *pmap;
00085 
00086     /* PBVH acceleration structure */
00087     struct PBVH *pbvh;
00088 
00089     /* Paiting on deformed mesh */
00090     int modifiers_active; /* object is deformed with some modifiers */
00091     float (*orig_cos)[3]; /* coords of undeformed mesh */
00092     float (*deform_cos)[3]; /* coords of deformed mesh but without stroke displacement */
00093     float (*deform_imats)[3][3]; /* crazyspace deformation matrices */
00094 
00095     /* Partial redraw */
00096     int partial_redraw;
00097     
00098     /* Used to cache the render of the active texture */
00099     unsigned int texcache_side, *texcache, texcache_actual;
00100 
00101     /* Layer brush persistence between strokes */
00102     float (*layer_co)[3]; /* Copy of the mesh vertices' locations */
00103 
00104     struct SculptStroke *stroke;
00105     struct StrokeCache *cache;
00106 } SculptSession;
